Class PowerBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • PowerBar

  • public class PowerBar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a player's power bar that hovers under the player. How much the power bar is filled up represents the power of the shot once the player swings.
    Version:
    5-23-2016
    Author:
    Shangyu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerBar(Player p, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs a specified player's power bar at specified y location and size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
      Draws the power bar.
      long getPower()
      Returns the power bar's current power
      void start()
      Turns power bar on, and begins updating power.
      void stop()
      Turns the power bar off, power reset to 0.
      void update()
      Updates the location and power of the power bar.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
